translations: v．下马；下车；从…上下来：从马背、车辆或其他高处下来。
· The rider dismounts from the horse.
n．下马；下车；从…上下来的动作。

sentences.sentence: Forced dismounts do not provoke opportunity attacks.
sentences.translation: 强迫下马不会引起机会攻击。

sentences.sentence: Bold Quest 2011 will focus on combat identification related to fires on dismounts.
sentences.translation: Bold Quest 2011将重点放在下车士兵的战斗识别。

sentences.sentence: We spent most of our time determining whether the hoard of dismounts we saw were hostile or not.
sentences.translation: 我们把绝大部分的时间花在了判断我们所看到的步兵是不是敌军的。
